heavyRainStartMessage: A heavy rain began to fall!
heavyRainEffectMessage: The Fire-type attack fizzled out in the heavy rain!
heavyRainContinueMessage: There is no relief from this heavy rain!
harshSunEffectMessage: The Water-type attack evaporated in the harsh sunlight!
harshSunContinueMessage: The extremely harsh sunlight was not lessened at all!

defaultEffectMessage: The attack was blocked by the weather effect!
